Name: MPI_STATUS_IGNORE
Description: MPI_STATUS_IGNORE informs MPI to not fill an MPI_Status, which saves some time. It is used in message reception (MPI_Recv), non-blocking operations wait (MPI_Wait, MPI_Waitany) and test (MPI_Test, MPI_Testany). A version of MPI_STATUS_IGNORE exists also for arrays of statuses: MPI_STATUSES_IGNORE.
